name: Holy Water
description: Water blessed by a priest, used for blessings, protection, and recalling Baptism.

name: Rosary
description: Beads used to meditate on the Mysteries of Christ and the Virgin Mary.

name: Scapular
description: A devotional garment signifying dedication and a call to Christian living.

name: Miraculous Medal
description: A medal of the Blessed Virgin Mary associated with St. Catherine Labour√©.

name: Blessed Salt
description: Salt blessed by a priest; sometimes used together with holy water.
